parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the retrieved submission

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: Label of the retrieved submission

parameter.label: Handle
parameter.tooltip: Handle of the retrieved submission

parameter.label: Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: Origin Id of the retrieved submission

parameters.parameter:
<%= if !@results['Retrieve Submission']['Origin'].nil? # Look for quotes plus "=>" characters. # If found, this returns a hash object as a string and needs to be converted # using eval and JSON.generate. # If those are not included, it has been stringified JSON and is OK as is. # This is done in the event the handler changes to report JSON instead of # exporting text.
if !@results['Retrieve Submission']['Origin'].index(/".*?"=>/).nil? eval_to_object = eval(@results['Retrieve Submission']['Origin']) JSON.generate(eval_to_object) else @results['Retrieve Submission']['Origin'] end end %>

parameter.label: Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: Parent Id of the retrieved submission

parameters.parameter:
<%= if !@results['Retrieve Submission']['Origin'].nil? # Look for quotes plus "=>" characters. # If found, this returns a hash object as a string and needs to be converted # using eval and JSON.generate. # If those are not included, it has been stringified JSON and is OK as is. # This is done in the event the handler changes to report JSON instead of # exporting text.
if !@results['Retrieve Submission']['Parent'].index(/".*?"=>/).nil? eval_to_object = eval(@results['Retrieve Submission']['Parent']) JSON.generate(eval_to_object) else @results['Retrieve Submission']['Parent'] end end %>
